name: Chiristmas Santa Run Pro - Kids Gift Collection
name_original: Chiristmas Santa Run Pro - Kids Gift Collection
description:
Christmas Santa Run 3D 2017
Santa Claus is coming to town for you Help Santa run and collect the Christmas gifts for you. Enjoy Santa running Xmas adventure for kids. Make Santa Jump and run fast. You can make Santa Jump twice by dragging upwards twice. Make Santa Run to collect your Christmas Gifts .
DRAG left & right to COLLECT Gifts!
DODGE & Avoid the path obstacles!
MAGNETS can help you collect more gifts.

COME play this incredible adventure!
JOIN the most daring chase!

HELP Santa now!
Cool winter theme with snow!
Colourful HD graphics!
Lots of obstacle-dodging fun!
Challenge and help your friends!

Christmas Santa Run 3D 2017 is a addictive fun game. Buy it now and start your journey!
